resources.string: We need location permission to show restaurants nearby you

Inorder to use this app, you need to login or register first.

Food and internet have been the most important aspects lately, while merging these two basic fundamentals what we can expect is a review application that allows us to know if a restaurant offers proper food or not which is based on the review of fellow food enthusiasts and application users. Food Nepal will help to avoid the situations where our expectations for a restaurant is hoping its nice but turns out exactly opposite. When a nearby restaurant is shown, users can also see some details regarding the restaurant along with the name and exact location. we would like to hear every good and bad comments,please feel free to contact us. submit your queries through the feedback submission page.\n\n Food Nepal@2019
